stage_identity.evidence: Teen Byte form maintained: gangly proportions, fuzzy blue texture, characteristic awkward posture at desk visible in candidate. Open eyes indicate awake state consistent with morning transition.

pixel_style.evidence: Clean pixel art style preserved with dithered shading, readable silhouette, 2D forms consistent with established aesthetic.

requested_changes_visible.evidence: Morning lighting transition applied: warm golden tones replacing night purple-blue, Chicago skyline showing dawn colors. No Z's visible (removed as expected for awake state). Content expression and alert posture reflect morning awakening.

artifact_free.evidence: No garbled text, floating glyphs, malformed anatomy, or smeared objects detected. Clean generation with proper form integrity.

prop_layout_integrity.evidence: Single golden trophy positioned on left side of shelf, single green leafy plant on right side of shelf with clear spacing between them. One food bowl with kibble on floor to right of desk. No duplicate props, no overlap between objects.

anchors_present.evidence: All scene anchors visible: wooden desk with Byte seated, oversized laptop with soft glow, Chicago skyline window in background showing morning light.

temporal_mood_match.evidence: Morning time-of-day (9 AM Chicago) correctly reflected with warm dawn lighting through window. Byte appears awake and content matching state.json mood='content' and is_sleeping=false. Night-to-morning transition lighting evident.

reground_cleanup.evidence: Check not applicable for normal mode. Edit count (4) below threshold (6), no re-ground triggered.
